bio:
With over ten years of development experience and a focus on Web 2.0 technologies since 2003, my background is suited for creating custom applications to resolve your business challenges or redesigning and optimizing your existing applications to make them more efficient. My expertise lies in creating usable, professional quality web applications and web sites based on your needs.  I have created intranet applications to track billing, clients, invoice processing, supply management, and other business related information.  I have also designed custom websites and web-based applications using a variety of standard technologies and methods using software from Microsoft, Oracle, IBM, and others.

I am experienced in application design and programming in Lotus Notes/Domino development, Javascript, HTML, DHTML, MySQL, MS-SQL, Oracle, PHP, ASP, Java, and other SQL-based database design and development.  My strength is converting the client's needs and wishes for their application or site

Payment Methods:  I prefer SafePay Escrow for new clients.  Will discuss payment method during the proposal process.  I am agreeable to accepting payment in the client's preferred method.Client Communications:I prefer initial communication with the client via e-mail or a notice on Guru.  Once we begin working on a project together, I will provide you with a contact phone number.  I am also available via Skype, Google Talk, or MSN.General Availability:I am available any time Monday through Saturday and after 1PM (EST) on Sunday.

bio:
Digital Artist, now available for freelance work: I have extensive experience in creating unique and original illustrations as well as advanced photo manipulation and retouching skills. 

I am a well practised artist with a natural and well trained eye for skin tones texture, colouring and bone structure. 

I have comprehensive knowledge and understanding of most commercial graphic design software; my weapon of choice is Photoshop CS5 which I use daily at a Grand Master level. 

Many examples of my work can be found at my online portfolio:

http://angelheartdesign.org/port2012/commercial/commercial.htm

My hourly rate is $35, which I realise is more expensive than some, however, I am proud to claim that I can usually achieve much more in an hour than most; and would always try to present value for money as well as provide unrivalled quality.

My lead time can be anything from  1-3 weeks and is largely dependent on the client,  a more detailed collaboration with the author usually takes a little longer but always results in a satisfied client.  I am aware that sometimes there is not a moment to lose, so I am open to negotiation on the deadline.

 I am looking to build lasting relationships with my freelance clients, and would (as always) offer unlimited revisions on any work undertaken. I do not ask for upfront fees and guarantee complete satisfaction before accepting payment.

All the work I produce is 100% original and is not  reliant  on any third party, this includes any photographs used, which are always my own unless otherwise stated. 

I do not and have never worked with adult content or contractors who exploit workers and children.

Non disclosure agreements are no problem and if you have any other questions, please do not hesitate to contact me at any time.

I am a certified office assistant with almost 2 years industry experience.  My skill sets, apart from secretarial, also include IT, and Spanish as a foreign language.
My specialty is creating documents of excellent quality according to specifications and on time.  If you are looking for English transcription of audio and video files, I am only a 'click' away.
